product_name: Nite Ize Lite Holster Stretch Flashlight Holster
long_description: The Nite Ize Lite Holster Stretch flashlight holster expands to fit nearly any size flashlight, from a mini flashlight that operates on AAA batteries to a large flashlight that runs on D batteries.
short_description: The Nite Ize Lite Holster Stretch flashlight holster expands to fit nearly any size flashlight, from a mini flashlight that operates on AAA batteries to a large flashlight that runs on D batteries.
